detail_desc: Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, heavily draping viscose jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a wrapover V-neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Watch with a rectangular metal face and imitation leather strap.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.

Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles.
Knee-high football socks in fine-knit fast-drying functional yarn with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
Necklace of three thin metal chains in various designs. One chain decorated with a metal bead and one with a rod-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Lace top with a small, scallop-edged stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the back of the neck and a yoke at the top. Long, wide sleeves with scallop-edged cuffs, and a scalloped hem. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved top in a soft patterned weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem.
Short skirt in jersey made from a soft modal blend with an elasticated waist and studs at the hem.
Cropped sports vest top in jersey with a racer back and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Top in soft, printed fleece with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length slip dress in satin with a draped neckline, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a slit in one side. Unlined.
T-shirt in ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges at the sleeves and hem.
Jacquard weave top with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and decorative straps at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Cropped, fitted sports top with short sleeves and wide ribbing at the hem. The sports top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.
Narrow, metal-chain waist belt decorated with plastic beads. Adjustable length. Small carabiner hook at one end.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Low neckline at the back with a grosgrain ribbon.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with flatlock seams, side panels, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.

prod_name: Dance to the bead Push Triangl
detail_desc: Triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Racer back of braided straps with metal decorations, and ties at the back.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Popover jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip at the top. Kangaroo pocket, zip in one side, elasticated cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted strappy top in fine-knit wool containing some cashmere.
Checked tights with an elasticated waist and a reinforced toe section. 40 denier.
Soft leather gloves with perforated details and holes at the knuckles. Open section with a tab and press-stud at the top. Unlined.
Garter-stitched jumper in a soft knit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sun visor in paper straw with an adjustable hook and loop fastener at the back.
Top in organic cotton jersey with narrow elastication around the neckline and short raglan sleeves.
Short-sleeved football shirt in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with press-studs at the back.

Suit trousers in marled Italian wool with stitching details. Concealed button and hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Knee-length, sleeveless one-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with a flounce and elastication at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Slim-fit joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fitted dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut at the top, a seam at the waist and a zip at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in an airy, patterned weave made from recycled polyester with a round neckline and a loose, wrapover yoke at the back. Opening at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Short sleeves with gathers, and gathers in the sides for a draped effect. Straighter fit to a seam at the hips and wide fit below. Asymmetric hem with pleats. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
Jumper in a soft wool rib knit with a round neck and long sleeves.
Scarf in soft woven fabric with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 40x160 cm.
Balconette bra in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic slub cotton jersey. Straight cut with a deep V-neck.
Jumper knitted in a wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in stretch jersey containing glittery threads with a regular, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in stretch viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Straight-cut hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight, wide legs.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and ties at the neckline and short sleeves with an opening and covered button.

Handbag accessory with a metal chain and carabiner hook and imitation leather pendant in the shape of a backpack. The backpack has a zip at the top, faux fur pompom and small, zipped outer compartment. Size approx. 3x7x9 cm.
Slightly shorter jersey top with a print motif, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Derby shoes in leather with pointed toes and open lacing. Leather linings and welt-stitched rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Scarf in a patterned weave. Size 50x50 cm.
Fully lined printed swimsuit.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt dress in a soft weave with motifs, a collar, button placket and decorative knot detail at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, side pockets and a bell-shaped skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Round-necked cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with glistening buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a lace trim and tie-top spaghetti straps. Smocking at the back,a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Straight-cut blouse in airy weave with covered buttons down the back, gathers at the shoulders and short balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication. Unlined.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Short dressing gown in cool satin with lace sections. Wrapover front with concealed ties at one side, a sewn-in tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length, scallop-trimmed sleeves.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side and covered wedge heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 9 cm.
Joggers in velour with an embroidered motif, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fitted V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a wrapover front and short sleeves.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Block-coloured top in organic cotton jersey with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
